values:
I know it's been ages since I updated, so I decided it was just time to make an entirely new journal.

if you want to see my new LJ, look here... 

http://www.livejournal.com/users/lilfishie2

bye bye.

so it's been almost a month since i've updated...

basically all that i've been doing is basketball like crazy. we look good too... damn good. i'm rrrrreal hyped. our first game is thursday out in BFE, but i don't even care - it's about time that we'll have an actual game. we're gonna have a gym too! i can't believe it! this season should be sweet... it better be anyways.

other than basketball... i've just been hanging out with friends -- playing mario kart, going to the movies - saw harold and kumar go to white castle and without a paddle... two GREAT movies! thought they we're absolultely hilarious. speaking of white castle... me and mj went up there the other day with $7.50 in quarters and bought 10 white castles and a large drink lol. that was a good time. 

speaking of a good time... summer has been one hell of a good time and it's a shame that it has to end with school starting on tuesday. :/ "my last first day of high school..." i hope this year carries on to be good like the summer was. i'm really getting into taking care of this college stuff. i'm doing all i can as of right now to get the chance to play college softball. anyways, i really have nothing to say, hence the reason i haven't updated in so long, so i'll update sooner than later...




one more thing... everyone left for college. thank you lauren for the voicemail, i still have it saved. once again you brought tears to my eyes. good luck to everybody and don't party tooooo hard ;).

-fish-

don't feel good.
bored.
got nothing to update about really...
car wash today - just about $400... chit i <3 u thanks for the food.
bourne supremecy yesterday with court and jill - pretty good.
basketball monday - haven't ran once... HAVE to go tonight.
basketball monday.
basketball monday.
basketball monday.
back to school soon.
senior :-O .
blah.

that's it.

i can finally say that i have come back changed from camp last week. this year isn't like any other one. maybe it's bcuz i'm a senior, bcuz we're all so close, or a combination of all those things and more. i'm liking how things are going with the team already. once we get in shape we are going to be so good it's crazy! so ya, forget basketball... we had to climb the damn two story wall that i absolutely HATE! (thanks to chit and pup for getting me up it!) then we had the high ropes... :-O i can't believe everyone on the team did everything. especially bcuz a few of us are deathly afraid of heights (me, andrea, shannon!) i'm so proud of everyone, and myself! hell who am i kidding? lol. i don't know what all to talk about... if you were there you nkow what all happened lol. way to play pretty decent too ladies! i'm hyped... if we only had a gym... grrr! but ya, i'm glad i've gotten closer with everyone and i'm seeing nothing but good things ahead for all of us.
*yeslek! talk about a turn around from last year! i love you. one more year together -- it's gonna be a good one, i can tell!*

other than all that...

being home and trying to get things back to how they were before i left is proving to be ::emotional:: i guess you could say. i don't know. i'm not worried about it though, things will be fine. =)

well, it's definitely getting closer to quizno's time. i haven't had it in soooo long! yummmm. lol.

so i realized that i haven't really been updating a lot lately. basically bcuz i don't know what to say. you probably won't think that makes any sense but oh well. anyways... my last macomb camp was this passed weekend. we absolutely tore shit up! we went 7-3 and i thought we played great. like pretty much everyone did, which is a good sign bcuz it's early. we leave for camp for a week on monday too. once we get back it'll be 30 days until school starts. :-O i can't believe it! hmm what else to say... softball is over for smith's team. we finished up in 3rd place. our regular season is over for the sharks too. i really don't understand why we don't win. it's sick. well, one more tournament in brighton this weekend. hopefully we do ok. oh by the way -- if you didn't already know, i chopped off my hair. it's realll short, but i like it. so ya, outside of that i've been doing a lot of hanging around. i hope everyone is enjoying their summer cuz i know i am.

Your love is... by ChibiMarronchan

Your eyes...twinkle in the moonlight
Your touch is...heart warming
Your smell is...amazing
Your smile is...encouraging
Your love is...one of a kind

blah. i feel like shit! tonight is a movie night which is a very good thing because i need to regain some strength since sports start up again tomorrow. anyways -- kels is coming over tonight and we are watching dodgeball. she is the queen of bootleg movies i swear lol. but ya, the purpose of this entry is to inform you of 7 songs that i love and remind me of my summer. so here they are. enjoy.
->Pieces of me - Ashlee Simpson
->Vindicated - Dashboard
->Ocean Avenue - Yellowcard
->Memory - Sugarcult
->The Reason - Hoobastank
->Accidentally in love - Counting Crows
->Crash - Dave Matthews Band

i <3 this summer!! so far it has been an absolute blast! hopefully the fun won't stop. and to top it all off, after a very llllong week of basketball... we finally have a few days off! yay! speaking of basketball -- i got my shoes for the season! here they are... enjoy.

 

 

 

 

it was supposed to happen. =P

-- did i mention i love summer?! =)

so i was watching an old episode of Dawson's Creek today. i really really liked what jen's dad said, so i found the quote! and now i'm gonna share it with you! enjoy...

Joey: "How does it surprise you everyday?"
 
Jen's dad: "Good question. A city like New York... where everything's moving all the time, at this constant, driving pace... it's like a living organism. Breathing, changing. Over time, your relationship to it becomes... like this incredible romance. At first, it's intoxicating, irresistable. And then slowly, it becomes comfortable, and safe. You have this cellular connection to it. As if you've known each other forever, like your oldest happiness. And sometimes you're on the outs, and sometimes you're making up, and every now and then, you catch yourself in this trancendent moment... where you think to yourself, "oh my God, I'm madly in love with you. And I always will be." And I think that's why it surprises me."

so these last two days have been crazy. basketball started yesterday... as i'm about to walk out the door i get a "don't come get me" phone call. i don't even know what else to say. i just wish there was something i could do... i've been trying, but, damn. so ya... don't expect to hear much about basketball in here until the season starts. so ya... i've got nothing else to say. love you and i'm sorry! you don't deserve to be put through that -- or people being incredibly inconsiderate towards the situation. don't even bother.
anyways... i'm dead so i'm gonna go to bed. haha i rhymed. nitey nite.

well, it's been a week since i've updated... i'm slacking, i know. so this has the potential to be a long one, depending on how much detail i feel like going into. ok here it goes...
last sunday - nothing special... had practice in the a.m. Jill definitely did not throw up in the middle of the coaches little talk. lol. they didn't even notice which was the best part. the only other thing that i remember that day was the pistons game. i'm getting old so a week ago is kinda far off on the radar.
monday - we were supposed to have our first summer ball game for smith's team but it rained for like 5 minutes so it was cancelled. so jill, mj, dayna, and i all went bowling, lol how random. (too bad lazer tag was a no go lol). after bowling there really wasn't much to do so we decided that we would go back to my house and play some cards. well it was a great time! we even went to white castle at like 1:30, good times.
tuesday - tuesday was full of a lot of laying around. but i don't remember what happened durring the day. all i know is i went to gibby's house for the pistons game with melissa. that was fun... hot ass notre dame guys. heyyyy. lol. but ya... Hell yes pistons! NBA champs baby! 
wednesday - for some reason i slept until 2pm on wednesday. which is pretty sad considering after th pistons game i went home and went to bed. so ya, after 2 and a half hours of being awake, i had to leave for our games at sterling heights. we won both games so that was exciting. the most exciting thing that happened on wednesday night was an absolutely hilarious couple of phone calls from MJ.
thursday - after watching almost all of the pistons parade, i went to SIJ and shot around. i went at 1:30 and came home at around 3. while i was there who comes roller blading up, but lindsay chitwood. what are the chances?! lol. she stayed up there and we talked and shot around for almost an hour. considering that was basically the first time i really talked to her all summer, it was nice to see her. good talks too. later on i went over to jill's. we went to taco hut and then to nino's with her mom. omg, i am in love with nino's. i love food! lol. after we got home we got ready, picked up melissa and then went to maggie's. that was fun but then we were getting eaten alive so jill, MJ, and dayna came over. more cards were played and a good time was had by all. it's a shame that MJ and dayna had to be home by 11:30 though. definitely stayed up till 4. =) fun night... =)
friday - who wakes me up in the morning... none other than my 7 year old cousin. oh boy! that was interesting. lol he said jill didn't have any eyebrows, too funny! anyways, went all the way out to battle creek to watch lake shore and regina play even though there was an hour's worth of traffic so we only made it to the lake shore game. they won so that was pretty exciting. friday night was nothin special, didn't get home till real late from battle creek so i just spent the night over jill's. 
saturday - sharks softball tournament at kyte with like half of our team there. thanks to the girls that did come. kara you played awesome... thanks again for being there! we lost our 3 games durring the day, but came up huge in the night game and absolutely rocked the real vipers. all i'm gonna say about that game is... don't make me get my gun back out. lol, becky i love you! welcome back lol.
today - we had one more game and lost 2-0 to the team that killed us 15-0 yesterday. we played pretty well we just didn't really hit the ball. i have to go over my yiayia's for a bit for father's day soon. but hopefully things will go right so something can happen later. we'll see. 
ok. that was reallll long. i'm suprised i remembered as much as i did. i think that will do for now though! later kids.

i can't get too specific, but damn was last night fun!! 'i am back!' lol. even though i had to take care of sickie at the end of the night and this morning, i still had a blast. pistons are on tonight too... hellllll ya! wow, i just got real light headed so i'm gonna go lay down. later kids.

p.s. my tongue hurts...
...i don't mind it though

this is the song that i'm listening to. i thought i would share it with you. if you can't tell i'm realllll bored. and i really can't think of anything else to say. so i'll just let you enjoy the song...

"Here Comes That Feeling Again" - Counting Crows

here comes that feeling again
you're always around me
this island life never ends
it just circles inside me
and when we're older
we'll go back to being friends
but oh,
here comes that feeling again
i better get away from all these
oh-so-familar places that i see
i gotta find a place without so many
familar faces in front of me
when i wake up in the morning
and there's no one there but me
i'll remember
i'll remember
here comes that feeling again
you're always around me
this island life never ends
it just circles inside me
and when we're older
we'll go back to being friends
but oh,
here comes that feeling again
gotta keep on moving through these
distances between yesterday and now
as if all this riding on these white lines

and are you sorry for what hasn't happened yet
i stare at everyone
it makes me wonder why

maybe change

but oh,
here comes that feeling again

one of the funnoest conversations i have ever had! lol. what great times can be made out of the sacks. :)

the day has finally come... the last day of school!! yay!! finals were today and yesterday, i think they went ok for the most part, i guess we'll just have to wait and see. this week was a waste, i pretty much feel like it's summer already... maybe it's because when it comes to school i am a bum. anyways... monday i pretty much don't remember bcuz i don't think i did anything. tuesday was the banquet for softball. after school, jill and i went around to like 432895 places looking for the seniors gifts. the banquet was fun... i got a few awards... all-conference, all-district, offensive mvp, and... all-academic!! i'm smart! lol. after the banquet me and jill went to cold cow and then back to her house to watch the pistons game. yesterday was a half day cuz of finals. missy, jill and i went out to eat at olga's. then we all went home. i had to drop something off to a certain someone and then went to chit's to pickup her soccer shirt and then back to jill's. then the 2 of us went to the soccer game, they lost 3-1. good job making it to regionals though girls. chit - you played AWESOME. then i went back and studied at jill's, actually got a lot of stuying done too! (not being sarcastic cuz i know it's hard to tell). so ya, today was the last day! yay! after school me and... well i'm sure you can figure it out by now... cleaned out my car then went to BK. and then watched chasing liberty... i liked it. the guy was so0o0o0o0o hot! so ya... i dunno what to say. so far there isn't much going on tonight but i realllllly wanna do something! pistons are on tonight! that's always a plus. well, i'm gonna go i guess, i was just bored so i figured i'd update on the week.

well, i'm in a better mood than yesterday. i'll start off by saying that. today was the first day in forever where i didn't have a sport... crazy! so i went to jill's to help her with her presentation tomorrow. then we went to chris, rodney, and fi's soccer game. they won 3-1 i think, that's 2 in a row for them lol. good job boys! then i came home and got my ap chem final done, so i'm pretty happy about that. it's 9 and i was gonna go running but after my 3 hours of sleep last night, i'm thinking that i need to catch up on some sleep, big time. so i guess i'm out. nitey nite kids... :-P

So how could i go on & where did we go wrong
can someone give me answers maybe
the way u looked in that dress so obviously selfish
can u just wake me in the end bcuz i am
Taking it all back thats every word that i said
for every word that u could never get the nerve to say
taking it all back thats every promise i made
for every promise u could never get the nerve to say
and tell me when u leave so i can finally breathe
though suffocating isnt so bad
can u just wake me in the end bcuz i am
Taking it all back thats every word that i said
for every word that u could never get the nerve to say
taking it all back thats every promise i made
for every promise u could never get the nerve to say
this world can swallow u whole
but i will never be taken alive...

 

there aren't words to discribe the amount of sadness that has taken me over. i just don't know, nor do i understand anything in this crazy journey that we would call life. i'm going to have to borrow some words from dashboard here and say that "i'm dying to live". too bad there are a few minor obstacles in my way. i really don't understand how so many acts of kindness can be repaid in such a manor.

i h e a r t l i f e...

*A friend will pick you up when you fall down... a best friend will laugh cause they're the one that tripped you*  =O ... 8)

thanks... doesn't quite do it justice, but it'll do for right now. =)

Where is the proper place to start saying goodbye to a class that you have made such close friends with? I guess saying thank you is good enough. It was you who first took us underclassmen under your wings, and we thank you for that. Some of us have been fortunate enough to remain clase through the trials and tribulations that high school throws in our path. Others have drifted apart for one reason or another. Either way, we could not have made it through without you. Some of you were our best friends, our mentors, our teammates, our fellow record breakers, our 'twins', and some of you, some of you will always have our hearts. If you take one thing out of high school, let it be the friends that you have made through out the years. All that we ask is that you remember us fondly, because underneath the rivalries and the food fights, there was a lot of love. Although today is without a doubt an emotional time, when you walk out of these halls for the last time, let a smile shine through your tears, because you have forever effected all of us. Whether it be college or something else you decide to pursue, we wish you much success in the path you choose. Thank you for the friendships and the memories, class of 2004. Always remember that even if we are miles apart, you will always be in our hearts.

i can remember the days when some of you guys considered me to be a part of your class. i love you all so much... damn you lauren for causing me to lose it back stage, damn you nick for causing me to lose it in line, and damn you speech for causing me to almost lose it on stage! =P i still remember this day freshman year saying to at that time the sophomores... i don't know what i'm going to do with myself when it's you guys leaving. that day finally came, and i just know that i'm going to be lost. this is gonna take a damn long time to get used to... and i know it will never feel right without you guys. oh man... i don't want to start to say anything to anyone individual bcuz this would be wayy too long of an entry. but to those of you who have been there all along, or even for a little bit along the way, i love you and will miss all of you soooo much. thank you all so much for everything... i just hope that i could be half the friend that you all have been to me.

-Steph-

i don't know. i'm not in a typing mood. counties were yesterday... blah. got 2 medals though. only other thing i feel like saying is... liesle travis - i love you girl. you are my hero on and off the track :) i'm gonna miss you sooo much next year! oh boy... the seniors have 2 days... 2 fucking days left... :( that is so sad you don't even know. i got my stuff for my senior t-shirt today... i don't even want to think about making it bcuz i don't want them to leave. *sigh*

 

i dunno...

 

p.s. don't be sorry

it was a 3 sport weekend for me. and i won't lie, i'm feeling pretty on top of the world. friday, well, i have an entire entry dedicated to what happened in track on friday, lol. saturday, we smoked fitz in both games and i played pretty damn good (even though they were real bad). today at basketball i though i was playing pretty damn good too! lol. awww, on a sad note, tonight was my last open gym... sorry MJ, i had to say it. the list of 'my last...' started today. i'm gettin old. anyways, here's what happened the rest of my weekend...

saturday - after our games i went over to jill's to eat dinner cuz her dad made steak and what not. then we hung out over there for a while. we were gonna go see shrek 2, but chit couldn't go, so we didn't end up going at all. so ya, after a while i went home and watched the pistons game. then, i decided it was time for me to go and buy the new dashboard cd, since i didn't have the actual CD. so i went to meijers all by myself at 11:30 at night. ya, definitely almost got abducted... it was pretty sweet... not! thank you chris salters for saving my life, i appreciate it, lol. after that little adventure i went over to josh threm's for his grad. party. that was a good time, i had a lot of fun. i ended up back at jill's at about 1:30 later on that night. wow, what a night... getting woke up by a huge BAM! at about 3:30. then having jill and the dog jump in my bed bcuz they were both scared, lol. then dayna and crystal came up and everybody passed out upstairs. jill - sorry i'm a roller! lol. i can't help it! :)

sunday - woke up at about 12:30, which is really late for me, even on a weekend. then i went out to eat with my dad and went home to get ready for the senior recital. everyone did soooo great! especially my lauren. omg as soon as you sang the first word, tears were in my eyes. you are truely amazing girl! i love you and you better sing that on your last day!! after that, i went to basketball and it went quite well. up until the whole sunami part! lol sarah... you're trail blazer in the middle of the parking lot all by its lonesome. poor guy! i could not believe it... the water was up to her knees! but ya, went back over to jill's and i just got home a little while ago from there.

so that was my weekend, i hope you enjoyed. i haven't typed this much in a while, but i'm in a typing mood. hmmmm.... i'm done typing now. i leave you with two things...

1. this quote for melissa john... i love you...

"f you're holding this letter you already know. The house has been boarded up. The doors. The windows. Everything. We're at the Comfort Inn. Room 112. I love you. Frank."

2. the song of the day... i will have you listen to it soon enough...

as lovers go by dashboard confessional... who else?!?

i normally put the link, but this song is too good not to put the whole thing in here...

"As Lovers Go"

she said "i've gotta be honest,
you're wasteing your time if you're fishing round here."
and i said "you must be mistaken,
cause i'm not fooling...this feeling is real"
she said...she said "you gotta be crazy,
What do you take me for? Some kind of easy mark?
"No, you've got wits, you've got looks,
you've got passion, but I swear that you've got me all wrong."

all wrong.
all wrong.
but you got me...

i'll be true, i'll be useful...
i'll be cavalier...i'll be yours my dear.
and i'll belong to you...
if you'll just let me through.
this is easy as lovers go,
so don't complicate it by hesitating.
and this is wonderful as loving goes,
this is tailor-made, whats the sense in waiting?

and i said "i've gotta be honest
i've been waiting for you all my life."
for so long i thought i was asylum bound,
but just seeing you makes me think twice.
and being with you here makes me sane,
i fear i'll go crazy if you leave my side.
you've got wits...you've got looks,
you've got passion but are you brave enough to leave with me tonight?

tonight.
tonight.
but you've got me...

i'll be true, i'll be useful...
i'll be cavalier...i'll be yours my dear.
and i'll belong to you...
if you'll just let me through.
this is easy as lovers go,
so don't complicate it by hesitating.
and this is wonderful as loving goes,
this is tailor-made, whats the sense in waiting?
this is easy as lovers go,
so don't complicate it by hesitating.
and this is wonderful as loving goes,
this is tailor-made, whats the sense in waiting?

 

*goodnight*

Can you say 52 seconds FLAT?!?!

New school RECORD!!!

Oh ya, there's one more minor detail I think i should say...

 

WE'RE GOING TO STATES!!!!!!

 

haul asS!!

I am in with Chris Carrabba! Dashboard was awesome last night!! i had a damn good time that is fo sho! ahhh... i would love to tell you all about it, but i can barely type right now! ya, it's 8:44, and i'm not in school. today has been crazy already. no hot water, no heat in the dryer... i'm at my dad's now and running a little behind. but i'm shaking bcuz i'm so fucking nervous for today! here is my day for you...
blood drive durring school...
drive out to marysville for my softball game...
leave at like 5:50 to go over to fitzgerald for...

REGIONALS!!

i have never been so nervous for anything ever in my entire life. once i get there i'm going to shit alllll over! i'm so hyped that i'm going but so nervous at the same time. ohhhhh man!!

alright... my stuff is finally dry now i think, so i should be heading off to school... leave me some luck!!!

ahhhhhhhhhhhhhh!!!!!!!!!
ya know, sometimes... just talking to you is enough to get me through. it's like, that's all i need and then i'm happy. if only...

so i took the day off today to catch up on some sleep. it was a damn good decision. other than practice, i didn't do anything. this entry is really about what i'm doing the rest of the week...
tomorrow - LAKE SHORE... 'nough said.
thursday - dashboard!!
friday - gonna see what i can do to run in regionals... according to some people i have no choice and i HAVE to go =). then... taking back sunday!!
saturday - double header with fitz
sunday - the zoooooo with shannon and whoever else we get to go with us! yay!

looks like this week has some serious potential. lol. anyways, i'm going to bed. 

i leave you with the song of the day...
- if i ain't got you - alicia keys -
http://www.lyricscafe.com/k/keys_alicia/023.htm

glad to see everything got worked out, again... =)

 

my final thoughts of today...

I am fairly agile
I can bend and not break
Or I can break and take it with a smile
And I am so resilient
I recover quickly
I'll convince you soon that I am fine

Try to understand there's and old mistake that fools will make
And I'm the king of them, pushing everything that's good away
Won't you hold me now

I will not bend I will not break...

if you don't know what went down today, who are you! all i want to say is thanks to everyone that was there for me. i really appreciate it, even if it didn't seem like it because of how... 'happy' i was. anyways...
we were supposed to have a game today at roseville but it got rained out. bummer... i had a good feeling about this one too. weird how a phone call from someone your pissed at can brighten your day. that was huge... and you don't even know it. so ya, melissa and i went to the soccer game since it ended up being nice out a little later on today. they won 3-1... chit scored the second goal, good job linds. after that i went home and ate and now i'm painting my nails and then calling memo. that'll about do it for today.


----> i've decided that i'm gonna do a song of the day for your amusment. it might mean something, it might not, it might just be a song i like! chances are... it'll be the third one. so i hope you enjoy either way...

...living life through Tacking Back Sunday lyrics... you would think that something is wrong... ha...

so last night was "the night". we kicked ass... the place looked awesome. all my fellow juniors or student congress i love you guys and everything was great... minor detail that we were missing about 20 cd's. lol. for the most part i had a good time at the dance. thanks billy for making it such a fun time! :) aside from my 2 episodes, i'd say it was a good time. lauren and i finally got our dances... :) and :/ at the same time i guess. *sigh* what else to say about the night... oh ya, one other thing... i've learned that you can do everything in your power to always try and make someone happy... even go completly out of your way... even excuse what some people would consider to be the worst thing ever... and people can still be nieve... they can still be ignorant... and they can still be just inconsiderate. as if it wasn't hard enough for me the whole fucking night... you think a person could have the common descentsy to do what they said they would... guess you were too busy...

so ya... we went 0-3 this week after going 3-0 this weekend. figures. grrrr... i'm piiiissed. but nothing can be done now. just get better for next time. anyways... prom is tomorrow! ahhh, i'm kinda scurred. it's 7 and i still have to go get my nails done, get jewelery, and go tanning... i love being last minute. hmmm... i know i haven't updated in a few days, but i really don't have anything interesting to say. oh ya... went to metro today, once i finally decided to go. spent the morning finishing my research paper. but once i got to metro i had a good time. all you dancers... you're crazy... but i love you. lol. but ya, i've got nothing else to say, so i'm gonna get going on my prom to do list. later kids...

so ya... there is one of the most random entries i have ever had. *nitey nite*

yesterday was the day... my first accident... yes, that's right... james is down... he tried to get an F150 up the ass... 

jill, cait, cimmer and i were on our way to our softball game yesterday. as always the traffic was in full affect. well i went to get over and i didn't see the car in front of me in the lane i was now in had stopped and well... bam! it really wasn't a loud bam though. of all the thing to say as i was making my way into the back of the truck i said... "oh crap, we're gonna hit it". so ya, got out and i guess things went quite well. i am just sooooooooooo happy that it wasn't anything bigger and that everyone in the car was ok. i don't know what i would have done if it was anything more than what happened... i talked to my dad today and the total damage was $850. but since he ordered it through his buddy it was $600. he also talked to the guy whose truck it was and the guy said he wanted a new bumper... all that was wrong was his lisence plate so i dunno what he's bitchin about but oh well. i guess that is gonna cost like $300 so there goes the $$ my dad saved from my parts. speaking of my dad... you would think that he would be so0o0o0o0o pissed, but he made fun of me more than anything. in fact, that is how both of my parents are handling this so i guess i got off pretty easy... so far... so ya, i hope you enjoyed the story of my first accident cuz i know i love the fact that i have one of those stories to tell!! grrr...

anyways, we finally won another league game yesterday. i played pretty well too, so that made me feel better. 4-1 vs. marysville. we played really well so i hope that we can keep that up. 

after that, and my whole car thing was taken care of i went to the soccer game with jill and melissa. after that joe drove us to taco hut and then back to jill's. we just hung out there and watched tv. melissa had to leave at 9 :( but i stayed and watched the OC then left at 10:30ish. so ya... that was my day yesterday, quite eventful one might say.





i can't believe i almost forgot this... WARNING DO NOT, UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCE, EVER LISTEN TO RASCAL FLATTS IN YOUR CAR!!

monday - played lake shore and lost. enough said.

today... meaps in the morning... yes! after the first 6 questions i was like, wow, this is harder than the act, but then it got easy. so ya... other than school i had softball practice and then went prom dress shopping with my dad and cait. got it at marshall fields at sommerset. i like it a lot and i found it online before so it was good to find it in a store. all there is left to say about my dress would have to be some of the melissa john's comments...

turtle4ever11: oooooo sexy mama
turtle4ever11: ur gonna look hot like a tamole lol

lol i love that girl! oh ya, i forgot that i also got a bathing suit too! it's from pac sun and it's so0o0o0o cute! i love it! good, but expensive day of shopping today...

tomorrow we play marysville at home at 4:30. we're gonna fucking win tomorrow so everybody be there at kyte! 


one more thing... *5.04.04* yay! lol. muhehehe!!

i actually had a good time at basketball tonight! :-0 i know, i don't believe it either. i dunno what else to say... hmm... since my other entry was kinda ehh in this one ill say what i did over the weekend... friday night...nothing! lol. that was easy... saturday i had orchestra states and a softball tourney. 2 at state! with a 1 in sightreading! yay! 2-1 in the tourney to put us in 2nd... we so couldve beaten foley if we didnt have one bad inning. aww i got to see meg and julie! :) i was so happy to see megan i havent seen her in so0o0o0o long! she's damn good at softball too. anyways! last night i went to melissa's. after a little while we decided to go see mean girls. we called up a bunch of ppl and out of those... jill was the only one that could go with us. it was like home on the range 2 lol. anyways... we all loved it. especially me, i had a laughing attack many times. lol. so ya that was a lot of fun! anyways... here are some more lyrics. i have a lot of them lately but i looooove lyrics and you should see them too.

that is me giving myself some confidence becuz i kinda need it lately. i spent the last couple days thinking that i wasn't good enough but now, well, now i'm over it. i know that it may not be right to get over this like that, and for as much as i'm probably not 100%, oh fucking well. it's worth a try. i don't care anymore and maybe i am a push over but you know what. that just makes me a better person. and i am a good fucking person, and a great fucking friend. call me cocky, right now i don't care. with only two months left in my junior year it's time to forget about the shit that won't matter in a few years and concentrate on the stuff that will. i am going to be all about softball, track, and school until we get out. bcuz i'm going to play in college damnit, i'm getting my 68 down to at least a 66 and i'm getting my damn GPA up too. no more dickin around about anything else. wow, felt good to get that out. this is more of a note to self then anything but you're reading it too so oh well. no more dwelling on the bad shit, just get done what you want done... there's my advice for the day. well, that is enough of that.

had a track meet at cousino today. almost didn't make it to my first race cuz i went to like 20 minutes of softball and the traffic getting there was kinda hectic... but i made it. so ya... i was in the 800 relay and finally... the 400 relay!! omg i was so incredibly hyped!! yay! but ya, both times we came in first so that was exciting. i'm not sure if we won overall, and neither is anyone else that i talked to so i guess i will just have to ask mr. bonne tomorrow. speaking of tomorrow... we start league play for softball! our first half of the rest of our games are home which is crazy and i don't like it.
anyways - Marine City... 4:30...Kyte Monroe... BE THERE!! :)

hmmm... what else to talk about besides sports??
>lauren, i look forward to what you have me reading tomorrow and i am very hyped to me your mini-me!! :)
>hoping there won't be drifting soon... and i don't mean my eye.

>i'd be your anything...

 

 

later dudes.

today is the day. the day that high school kids everywhere hate... the last day of spring break. i, like many others i'm sure, will do my share of last minute homework, even though i don't really care how it turns out bcuz my mind is all about softball. after yesterday, how can it not be... as you know, we went 2-1 on friday. that put us in 4th place over all, so we had to play the first place team... milford... the team that killed everyone. long story short... we lost 2-1 in extra innings. we came so0o0o close. had a few bad calls along the way, but against a team like milford one call, one at bat, or one mistake won't win or lose the game. so ya, that put us in the game for 3rd place against stevenson. going into the last inning we were down four runs. i got up with one out and got on base. then there was two outs... then i scored... and then there were bases loaded. who comes up to bat... none other than the bambino herself - CIMMER. she was kinda struggling the whole weekend, but as soon as the ball hit the bat we alllll knew it was gonna be somethin special. can you say over the fence grand slam with two outs to give us a one run lead!?!! how huge is that! they were the home team so they got last bats but we held them and won the game!! oh man... so that brings us to 5-2 overall. we have a scrimmage on monday against grosse pointe south and then we start league play on wednesday against marine city. i'm hyped!!

other than softball, which has taken up a lot of my break, i have basically hung out with my team. (we are so close it's crazy)... specifically jill really. lol we are such losers and need to get more friends! no just kidding. i've had a lot of fun this break after i got healthy bcuz of you babe! my muhahaha... i love you hun!! *4.5.04* lol. oh boy... we are too much. =)

now i guess it's time to start doing this homework. i hope everyone had an awesome break. i'll see you all tomorrow...

well today was quite the day. three games! we lost the first but won the second two. jillian kay van antwerp... who are you?!? lol,you did awesome today hunnie! in the park home run! that is come crrrrazy shit! i'm sooo proud! so ya, we did alright today. tomorrow our first game is against the hicks we lost to, we're gonna fuck 'em up!! wheew!!
one more thing about today... you don't notice how much you miss someone until you see them and really talk to them (or play against them for that matter). mel... i miss you so0o0o much it's crazy. you're one of the best friends that i've ever had and we need to start hanging out like the good old days! i love you girl... and oh ya, thanks for single handedly kicking my ass today! =)

well jill and i are off BACK to kyte to watch the guys. later...
